message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the training of a single recurrent neural network to solve a variety of tasks through various learning methods, including reinforcement learning and unsupervised learning. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and neural networks (cs.NE). The use of the network to control a robot suggests a connection to robotics (cs.RO), and the focus on incremental learning and the PowerPlay method suggests a connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
